original_text: Asa was angry with the prophet, so he put him in prison. At that time Asa also started to do cruel things to some people.
korean_text: 아사가 노하여 선견자를 옥에 가두었으니 이는 그의 말에 크게 노하였음이며 그 때에 아사가 또 백성 중에서 몇 사람을 학대하였더라

sentences.original_text: Asa was angry with the prophet
so he put him in prison
At that time Asa also started
to do cruel things to some people
